newsitem.title: USA: UPS Q3 express volume up 9.3 pct.
newsitem.headline: UPS Q3 express volume up 9.3 pct.

text.p: United Parcel Service said Tuesday domestic and international express business for the quarter ending September 30 showed daily volume rose 9.3 percent over the same quarter last year.

UPS said it handled an average daily volume of 1,603,000 express packages and documents for the quarter. Domestic express volume (UPS Next Day Air, 2nd Day Air and UPS 3 Day Select) grew 9.4 percent compared to the same period in 1995.
International express volume (UPS Worldwide Express, UPS Worldwide Expedited, UPS Euro Express and UPS Euro Expedited) increased 8.4 percent, the package carrier said.
